channel.title: Awesome way to read the forums
channel.description:
Prompted by the music-related thread in the Suggestions Box, I just went to [url='https://www.joelnielsen.com/music']Joel's site[/url] to download the BM soundtrack clips and give them another listen.
While listening to the tracks, I went back to browsing the forums, and damn if it doesn't improve the experience. Reminds me of browsing the media on the BM website when they still had the music player on the right. Give it a try, see what you think!
